notes.note: Added 5 grams Citra for dry hopping

batchYeasts.name: Safale American
batchYeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.

boilSteps.name: Citra, Irish Moss, Lallemand Servomyces, Wort Chiller

recipe.name: 06 SMaSH Citra

recipe.notes: Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).
recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter
